entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

Observed at: Estevan Point 7:00 AM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
